duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide operating system support services to Mainline clientele on a project or managed basis.
Participate in the development of proposals and presentations to management and clients.
Assist in the identification of additional service opportunities.
Serve as a trusted advisor to clients.
Work with client and Mainline Marketing to assure solutions meet the client’s business objectives.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree or equivalent experience required.
Minimum of ten years operating system support experience preferred.
Five years of experience in customer-facing environments with good presentation skills desired.
Core competency in implementation, maintenance, and support of at least one operating system environment (z/OS, z/VSE, or z/VM) required.
IBM or other appropriate vendor certifications desired.
